revision.comment: [[WP:AES|‚Üê]]Created page with ''''Ilham Ahmed''' is a Maldivian politician who is the current [[Member of Parliament|MP]] for [[Gemanafushi]] Constituency in the [[People's Majlis]] and the Pr...'
revision.text: '''Ilham Ahmed''' is a Maldivian politician who is the current [[Member of Parliament|MP]] for [[Gemanafushi]] Constituency in the [[People's Majlis]] and the President of [[Football of Association of Maldives]].<ref>http://www.haveeru.com.mv/sports/47064<ref/> A native of [[Gemanafushi]] in [[Huvadhu Atoll]], Ilham's family roots trace back to [[Fuvahmulah]] and [[Addu Atoll]].<ref>http://liyuntherin.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=283<ref/><ref>http://liyuntherin.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=243<ref/>
